TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit JumpPath extends System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem

Docs.summary: Represents a link to a file that is displayed in a Windows 7 taskbar Jump List.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> is a reference to a file that can be opened from a [!INCLUDE[win7](~/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar Jump List. If your application is not registered to handle the file type of the item, the file will not appear in the Jump List. For example, if you add a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> to a .txt file, your application must be registered to handle .txt files.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
Gets or sets the path to the file to be included in the Jump List.
Docs.value: The path to the file to be included in the Jump List.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The application must be registered to handle the file name extension of the specified file; otherwise, the item is rejected. For example, if you add a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> to a .txt file, your application must be registered to handle .txt files.
